data.subTitle: 文本的语音朗读
data.content:
<button onclick="speak()">click</button>
<script>
function speak(){
    let msg = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance();
    //msg.rate = 5 //播放语速
    //msg.pitch = 1.5 //音调高低
    msg.text = "在网页上通过JS实现文本的语音朗读"
    //msg.volume = 1 //播放音量
    speechSynthesis.speak(msg);
}

</script>
